card.name: Meteosaur
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Metalwing Skyterror
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a creature in the battle zone that has "blocker" and destroy it. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Rumble Gate
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power until the End Step ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that can attack creatures can attack untapped creatures this turn.

card.name: Velyrika Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Armored Dragon from your deck, show that Armored Dragon to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Double Breaker
